page.title: 07SPALDWICK BY-PASS
page.content: Spaldwick village had two dangerous bends resulting in many accidents because there is a lot of traffic on the A6O4. A new by-pass was built in record time and opened in summer1982. It has made a big difference to the village which is now peaceful. For the first few months after the opening trade in the shops and garage was affected ,but they didn't take out any more advertising.Signs were erected on the by-pass to show that there is a cafe and garage in the village .The trades people are not pleasd with the lost trade but think the by-pass is a good thing .some lorries still pass through the village.
